imitiyas bakir makar punchi shishyayatath, gotabhaya rajapaksha ha mohan lal greru wani shishyayantath nobiyawa nopakila wedikawaka kathakarannata, niwaradiwa nirawulwa tharka karannata kiyadunne wijesinha guruthuma.newasika sisun lesa siti bakir wagema gotabhaya sisun newasikagare idiripita thibunu kuluna matha nanwala “dan ahawala wage” katha karanna; “dan beliaththe manthrithuma wage katha karanna” kiyamin owun diriganwamin katha kalawa purudu puhunu kala hati sihi karana kota barti wijesinha guru piyage deneth keweni agata ada nangenne santhushtiye unusum kandulu bindu.usas pela kala panthiyedi thamayi ethumata me rate anagatha peralikara kalakara charitha kipayak munagahune.

1948 upatha laba athi athara rajakiya lanka nawika hamudawe idurama bandawagath upa luthinanwarayeku washayen 1971 juni 23 wana dina nawika hamudawata ekwi atha. 1974 luthinan, 1982 luthinan komandar 1985 komandar, 1990 komadoru saha 1992 riyar admiral yana thanathuru wetha usaswim laba atha. 1993 wasare di nawika hamudadhipathi dhurayata pathkarimath samagama wayis admiral nilayen pidum labana ladi. 1992 wasare di amarika eksath janapadaye di siya mandalika patamalawa hadara atha. 1997 janawari 27 wana dina admiral dhurayata usas wu athara, ee samagama nawika hamuda diwiyen wishrama yana ladi.
